gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.time

Class J2kSec

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.time.J2kSec

  • public class J2kSec
extends Object
    A utility class for working with j2ksecs. J2ksec is a time standard created by Dan Cervelli for use with winston and associated tools. The j2ksec ephoch is 2000-01-01T00:00+12:00.
    Author:
    Tom Parker

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double UNIXZERO
      add to a j2ksec to get a UNIX epoch.

      • parse

        public static double parse(String format,
           String date)
                    throws ParseException
        Parse string into J2K date, log errors.
        Parameters:
        format - Format name to parse
        date - date string
        Returns:
        parsed J2K date or 0 if exception occurred
        Throws:
        ParseException - when string cannot be parsed
